abstract: Two weeks after Bank of America, Citigroup, JP Morgan and Wachovia pledged their support for the Master Liquidity Enhancement Conduit, intended to take the sting out of the recent liquidity squeeze, other banks have chosen to look the other way.
lead_paragraph: Two weeks after Bank of America, Citigroup, JP Morgan and Wachovia pledged their support for the Master Liquidity Enhancement Conduit, intended to take the sting out of the recent liquidity squeeze, other banks have chosen to look the other way.

headline.main: Super Conduit Leaves Many Banks Cold
